Uses of Package
org.apache.commons.math4.geometry.euclidean.oned

  • Packages that use org.apache.commons.math4.geometry.euclidean.oned 
    Package Description
    org.apache.commons.math4.geometry.euclidean.oned
    This package provides basic 1D geometry components.
    org.apache.commons.math4.geometry.euclidean.threed
    This package provides basic 3D geometry components.
    org.apache.commons.math4.geometry.euclidean.twod
    This package provides basic 2D geometry components.
    org.apache.commons.math4.geometry.partitioning
    This package provides classes to implement Binary Space Partition trees.
  • Classes in org.apache.commons.math4.geometry.euclidean.oned used by org.apache.commons.math4.geometry.euclidean.oned 
    Class and Description
    Euclidean1D
    This class implements a one-dimensional space.
    Euclidean1D.NoSubSpaceException
    Specialized exception for inexistent sub-space.
    Interval
    This class represents a 1D interval.
    IntervalsSet
    This class represents a 1D region: a set of intervals.
    OrientedPoint
    This class represents a 1D oriented hyperplane.
    SubOrientedPoint
    This class represents sub-hyperplane for OrientedPoint.
    Vector1D
    This class represents a 1D vector.
    Vector1DFormat
    Formats a 1D vector in components list format "{x}".
    Vector1DFormatAbstractTest
